shortdesc.ph: Updates the display mode of the video view of a remote user.

p.codeblock: public abstract int setRemoteRenderMode(int userId, int renderMode, int mirrorMode);
virtual int setRemoteRenderMode(uid_t userId, RENDER_MODE_TYPE renderMode, VIDEO_MIRROR_MODE_TYPE mirrorMode) = 0;
public abstract int SetRemoteRenderMode(uint uid, RENDER_MODE_TYPE renderMode, VIDEO_MIRROR_MODE_TYPE mirrorMode);
Future<void> setRemoteRenderMode( {required int uid, required RenderModeType renderMode, required VideoMirrorModeType mirrorMode});

section.title: Details
section.p: After initializing the video view of a remote user, you can call this method to update its rendering and mirror modes. This method affects only the video view that the local user sees.

ul.li: Please call this method after initializing the remote view by calling the method.
During a call, you can call this method as many times as necessary to update the display mode of the video view of a remote user.
